=== Annotation of a multiple targets ===

AO allows to annotate multiple targets belonging to the same or multiple documents. In fact, it is possible to define multiple contexts (through multiple [Selectors Selectors]) for the same annotation entity. These can point to the same or different [SourceDocument Source Documents].
